    • setClientServerConnection

      public void setClientServerConnection(ClientServerConnection clientServerConnection)
      Sets the ClientServerConnection. This object allows the View to send messages and to update the network interface about the current situation (user data is ready, action message is ready, ecc...).
      Specified by:
      setClientServerConnection in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      clientServerConnection - the ClientServerConnection

    • setUserReady

      public void setUserReady(boolean userReady)
      Updates the current situation: if user ready is set to true, the ClientServerConnection will know that it can be sent to the Server.
      Specified by:
      setUserReady in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      userReady - a boolean that tells if the User object is ready to be sent to the server
